description: Video debug page opened to all non-guest researchers; silent DB save failure fixed by switching from upsert to update in saveVideoUrl.

changes.description: Open video debug page to all non-guest researchers (was super-admin only)
changes.details: Removed requireSuperAdmin from App.tsx route and isSuperAdmin guard from ResearcherDashboard.tsx nav button. Any authenticated non-guest researcher can now access the page.

changes.description: Fix saveVideoUrl silent failure â€” switch upsert to update to avoid NOT NULL constraint
changes.details: saveVideoUrl called .upsert({run_id, video_url}) without required NOT NULL fields (flow_id, run_created_at). PostgreSQL evaluates NOT NULL before ON CONFLICT so the upsert silently failed even when the row existed. Switched to .update().eq('run_id', ...) and added error throw so failures surface in the UI. Videos uploaded to Storage will now have their URLs saved to the DB.
